EmailTemplate.name: 2015 Dubai AIrShow Inmarsat.2015 Dubai AIrShow Inmarsat Email
EmailTemplate.subject: An invitation to connect
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Today's airline passengers expect Wi-Fi in the sky just like they get at home. High quality, high speed broadband is coming. Join us to celebrate the launch of our global GX service and find out more about this next generation technology that will carry your passengers into the future. Date:Sunday 8th November
Time:18:00-21:00
Location:Jumeirah Golf Estate Clubhouse
RSVP:Click here <https://pages3.honeywell.com/dubaiLP.html> We hope that you will be able to join us in the luxurious and relaxing surroundings of the Jumeirah Golf Estates Clubhouse, for a relaxing evening of light jazz and refreshments
